articles.title: History-maker Israel Olatunde broke Irish record with 'burst' spikes - The42
articles.description: The 20-year-old finished sixth in the final of the 100m at the European Championships last night.
articles.content:
IT HAS been revealed that Israel Olatundes heroics at the European Championships last night took place despite burst spikes.
